title: Looking to buy a champ
body:
Like a champ that's fun and requires a bit of effort to master (or in other words, something that doesn't appear on free week much...exc.urgot)
Thinking about getting viktor and yorick bc theyre like the only champs that ive never played
BONUS QUESTION: has anyone seen yorick on free week in the last 12 months?

replies.body: Rumble is pretty fun. Takes time to master his heat and hitting good ults etc.
that's like when I didn't realise that yorick's ult could use abilities :/

>BONUS QUESTION: has anyone seen yorick on free week in the last 12 months?

Because his in line for a rework, he isn't going to be in free week until said rework actually happens.
I haven't seen yorick on free week ever, so he hasn't been on it since at least the start of season 3.
Ashe, high skill cap champion, buy her instantly with RP and all her skins.
